messages.title: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY’S PRIORITIES
content: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament.

A vote for Labour means another hung parliament. With Corbyn propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain. That’s five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
With your support, a Conservative majority government can get on with the country’s priorities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I have worked hard to support jobs and economic growth. I regularly meet small business owners across the constituency and helped secure over £4.6m in Local Growth Funding.

I campaigned to keep Castleberg Hospital open when services were withdrawn in April 2017. I repeatedly raised local concerns about the rurality of our area and the need for service provision in Craven. In May 2018 the Trust voted unanimously for the hospital to be reopened.

I led the campaign to get further investment in broadband. £20.5m of public funding was provided in phase 3 for the superfast broadband roll-out. Tens of thousands of families and small businesses are benefiting from high speed, reliable broadband.

endorsements.endorsement: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.

quotes.text: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.

A vote for Labour means another hung parliament. With Corbyn propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain. That’s five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.

That’s five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
